items.title: Initial Mobile App Framework Setup
items.description: Set up the foundational codebase and project structure for the mobile application.
acceptance_criteria: A new mobile app project is created using the chosen framework (e.g., React Native, Flutter, native iOS/Android).
The app builds and runs successfully on both Android and iOS simulators/emulators.
Basic navigation structure is implemented with at least two screens.
dependencies: Access to development tools and SDKs
non_functional: Codebase must follow agreed coding standards
Project structure must support scalability for future features

notes: User request is vague; assumptions made about cross-platform support and basic navigation. Further details needed on app purpose, target audience, and core features.
